title: ettanai nAL
sahitya:
ettanai nAL murugA endanukkirangAmal irundu vandennai varundiDa viDuvAyO


anupallavi

  ittanai nALumE nAn bhaktiyODunai nittam cittam urugavE tudi sheidiTTa pinnumE


caraNam    tannai arinduyarum tava yOga murai ariyEn unnai iranduyyum upAyam tAn arivEn
cenni malai tannil urai panniru karattayyE ennaik-karai EtravE un karam onrE pOdum
